trans-unit.source: Upgrade from the old Visual Studio Online version of Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Upgrade from the old Visual Studio Online version of Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Upgrade existing projects
trans-unit.target: Upgrade existing projects

trans-unit.source: Upgrade from the old Visual Studio Online version of Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Upgrade from the old Visual Studio Online version of Application Insights

trans-unit.source: This document is of interest to you only if you have a project that is still using the older version of Application Insights, which was part of Visual Studio Online.
trans-unit.target: This document is of interest to you only if you have a project that is still using the older version of Application Insights, which was part of Visual Studio Online.

trans-unit.source: That version will be switched off in due course, and so we encourage you to upgrade to the new version, which is a service within Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: That version will be switched off in due course, and so we encourage you to upgrade to the new version, which is a service within Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: Which version have I got?
trans-unit.target: Which version have I got?

trans-unit.source: If you added Application Insights to your project using Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 or later, it most probably uses the new Azure version.
trans-unit.target: If you added Application Insights to your project using Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 or later, it most probably uses the new Azure version.

trans-unit.source: Open ApplicationInsights.config.
trans-unit.target: Open ApplicationInsights.config.

trans-unit.source: If it has nodes `ActiveProfile` and `Profiles`, it's the old version and you should upgrade.
trans-unit.target: If it has nodes `ActiveProfile` and `Profiles`, it's the old version and you should upgrade.

trans-unit.source: Or look at your project in Visual Studio Solution Explorer, and under References, select Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.
trans-unit.target: Or look at your project in Visual Studio Solution Explorer, and under References, select Microsoft.ApplicationInsights.

trans-unit.source: In the Properties window, find the Version.
trans-unit.target: In the Properties window, find the Version.

trans-unit.source: If it's less than 0.12, then you should upgrade.
trans-unit.target: If it's less than 0.12, then you should upgrade.

trans-unit.source: If you have a Visual Studio project ...
trans-unit.target: If you have a Visual Studio project ...

trans-unit.source: Open the project in Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 or later.
trans-unit.target: Open the project in Visual Studio 2013 Update 3 or later.

trans-unit.source: Delete ApplicationInsights.config
trans-unit.target: Delete ApplicationInsights.config

trans-unit.source: Remove the Application Insights NuGet packages from the project.
trans-unit.target: Remove the Application Insights NuGet packages from the project.

trans-unit.source: To do this, right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose Manage NuGet Packages.
trans-unit.target: To do this, right-click the project in Solution Explorer and choose Manage NuGet Packages.

trans-unit.source: Delete the folder AppInsightsAgent and the files it contains.
trans-unit.target: Delete the folder AppInsightsAgent and the files it contains.

trans-unit.source: Remove all Microsoft.AppInsights settings names and values from ServiceDefinition.csdef and ServiceConfiguration.csfg
trans-unit.target: Remove all Microsoft.AppInsights settings names and values from ServiceDefinition.csdef and ServiceConfiguration.csfg

trans-unit.source: SDK: Right-click the project and [choose Add Application Insights][greenbrown].
trans-unit.target: SDK: Right-click the project and [choose Add Application Insights][greenbrown].

trans-unit.source: This adds the SDK to your project, and also creates a new Application Insights resource in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This adds the SDK to your project, and also creates a new Application Insights resource in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Logging: If your code includes calls to the old API such as LogEvent(), you'll discover them when you try to build the solution.
trans-unit.target: Logging: If your code includes calls to the old API such as LogEvent(), you'll discover them when you try to build the solution.

trans-unit.source: Update them to [use the new API][track].
trans-unit.target: Update them to [use the new API][track].

trans-unit.source: Web pages: If your project includes web pages, replace the scripts in the
trans-unit.target: Web pages: If your project includes web pages, replace the scripts in the

trans-unit.source: sections.
trans-unit.target: sections.

trans-unit.source: Typically there's just one copy in a master page such as Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.
trans-unit.target: Typically there's just one copy in a master page such as Views\Shared\_Layout.cshtml.

trans-unit.source: [Get the new script from the Quick Start blade in your Application Insights resource in Azure][usage].
trans-unit.target: [Get the new script from the Quick Start blade in your Application Insights resource in Azure][usage].

trans-unit.source: If your web pages include telemetry calls in the body such as logEvent or logPage, [update them to use the new API][api].
trans-unit.target: If your web pages include telemetry calls in the body such as logEvent or logPage, [update them to use the new API][api].

trans-unit.source: Server monitor: If your app is a service running on IIS, uninstall Microsoft Monitoring Agent from the server, and then [install Application Insights Status Monitor][redfield].
trans-unit.target: Server monitor: If your app is a service running on IIS, uninstall Microsoft Monitoring Agent from the server, and then [install Application Insights Status Monitor][redfield].

trans-unit.source: Web tests: If you were using web availability tests, [recreate them on the new portal][availability], with their alerts.
trans-unit.target: Web tests: If you were using web availability tests, [recreate them on the new portal][availability], with their alerts.

trans-unit.source: Alerts: Set up [alerts on metrics][alerts] in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Alerts: Set up [alerts on metrics][alerts] in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: If you have a Java web service ...
trans-unit.target: If you have a Java web service ...

trans-unit.source: In your server machine, disable the old agent by removing references to the APM agent from the web service startup file.
trans-unit.target: In your server machine, disable the old agent by removing references to the APM agent from the web service startup file.

trans-unit.source: On a TomCat server, edit Catalina.bat.
trans-unit.target: On a TomCat server, edit Catalina.bat.

trans-unit.source: On a JBoss server, edit Run.bat.
trans-unit.target: On a JBoss server, edit Run.bat.

trans-unit.source: Restart the web service.
trans-unit.target: Restart the web service.

trans-unit.source: In the Microsoft Azure portal, [add a new Application Insights resource][java].
trans-unit.target: In the Microsoft Azure portal, [add a new Application Insights resource][java].

trans-unit.source: In your development machine, add [the Java SDK][java] to your web project.
trans-unit.target: In your development machine, add [the Java SDK][java] to your web project.

trans-unit.source: Replace the scripts in the
trans-unit.target: Replace the scripts in the

trans-unit.source: sections of your web pages.
trans-unit.target: sections of your web pages.

trans-unit.source: (There might be just one copy in a server side include.) [Get the new script from the Quick Start blade in your new Application Insights resource in Azure][usage].
trans-unit.target: (There might be just one copy in a server side include.) [Get the new script from the Quick Start blade in your new Application Insights resource in Azure][usage].

trans-unit.source: If your web pages include telemetry calls in the body such as logEvent or logPage, [update them to use the new API][track].
trans-unit.target: If your web pages include telemetry calls in the body such as logEvent or logPage, [update them to use the new API][track].

trans-unit.source: Web tests: If you were using web availability tests, [recreate them on the new portal][availability], with their alerts.
trans-unit.target: Web tests: If you were using web availability tests, [recreate them on the new portal][availability], with their alerts.

trans-unit.source: Alerts: Set up [alerts on metrics][alerts] in the Azure portal.
trans-unit.target: Alerts: Set up [alerts on metrics][alerts] in the Azure portal.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
